org.bytedeco.javacpp

Class avformat.AVIOContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.javacpp.avformat.AVIOContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    avformat

    public static class avformat.AVIOContext
extends Pointer
    Bytestream IO Context. New fields can be added to the end with minor version bumps. Removal, reordering and changes to existing fields require a major version bump. sizeof(AVIOContext) must not be used outside libav*. \note None of the function pointers in AVIOContext should be called directly, they should only be set by the client application when implementing custom I/O. Normally these are set to the function pointers specified in avio_alloc_context()

      • position

        public avformat.AVIOContext position(long position)
        Overrides:
        position in class Pointer

      • av_class

        @MemberGetter
 @Const
public avutil.AVClass av_class()
        A class for private options. If this AVIOContext is created by avio_open2(), av_class is set and passes the options down to protocols. If this AVIOContext is manually allocated, then av_class may be set by the caller. warning -- this field can be NULL, be sure to not pass this AVIOContext to any av_opt_* functions in that case.

      • buf_end

        @Cast(value="unsigned char*")
public BytePointer buf_end()
        End of the data, may be less than buffer+buffer_size if the read function returned less data than requested, e.g. for streams where no more data has been received yet.
